mapper.update: update product_pic set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ext = #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, ext, product_id, url, create_time, create_name, update_time, update_name from product_pic
